1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: Fadl bin Mubashshir said:"I saw Jabir bin 'Abdullah performing every prayer with one ablution, and I said: 'What is this?' He said: 'I saw the Messenger of Allah doing this, and I am doing as the Messenger of Allah did

chapter.ara-name: باب الْوُضُوءِ لِكُلِّ صَلاَةٍ وَالصَّلَوَاتِ كُلِّهَا بِوُضُوءٍ وَاحِدٍ
chapter.eng-name: Performing ablution for each prayer and offering all prayers in one ablution
